> <OLD - HYDRAS>
>
> Hydras looked at Lion Pime and said "Now what Prime"

LEO PRIME glanced back at HYDRAS, "Isn't he one of your lackeys?" His
voice was the confident voice of a commander as he pulled out his own
weapon and aimed it skyward.

The MAXIMALS began doing the same thing.

SKY SHADOW looked at HYDRAS a look of surprise clearly written on his face.

The look was mirrored by INJECTOR, one of SKY SHADOW's lieutenants.
"Why is Hydras asking Prime anything?" INJECTOR asked in a low voice.

"Shut up and fire!" SKY SHADOW snapped as he turned his weapons upward
and began to fire. However it was obvious as he pulled the trigger he
too was having thoughts in the same direction.

The other FUZORS began following suit!

> <OLD>
>
> Quickstride looks up at Cyclonus with sarcasm.
>
> " STAND BACK GUYS, I GOT THIS!  OH YEAH PAL!?  TAKE THIS!"
>
> He turns his rump on Cyclonus and blasts a noxious fume into the sky in his
> direction.
>
> " Hopefully this will knock him out long enough ta figure out who put the
> bug on him."

<NEW>

"Maybe!" TORCA said as he looked upwards. "Look!"

Up above the shots from the MAXIMALS and PREDACONS were firing up
skies! While the seekers above moved to avoid the shots, the sweeps
and CYCLONUS made no effort at all.

In fact the shots from the those on the ground, rather than hitting
them appeared to be passing through them. The cloud from QUICKSTRIDE
seemed to have a similar affect. It rose up from the ground and
quickly dissipated. However even the dispersed cloud seemed to move
through the sweeps without affect.

Meanwhile HYDRAS heard a voice behind him, "It is time." and then
HYDRAS' world went black!

(TAG)

- Preston
